attributes.action: I call on the Prime Minister to exclude Boris Johnson from all Cabinet positions
attributes.background: Boris Johnson has shown himself as an opportunistic, self-serving politician who has misled the electorate. He has recently been appointed as Foreign Secretary, bringing the U.K. into ridicule in the eyes of the rest of the world. His position in this role is untenable.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Cabinet Ministers to be sacked, fired or excluded from future office.
